summary.title: Summary
summary.intro: Програміст із понад 10-річним досвідом розробки та впровадження масштабованих веб та мобільних застосунків. Моя основна сильна сторона — фронтенд і сучасна екосистема JavaScript/TypeScript. Також маю досвід full-stack розробки, роботи з API, інтеграцій зі сторонніми сервісами та участі в повному циклі розробки. Для мене важливий код, який дійсно працює: продуктивний, підтримуваний і легко масштабований. Маю досвід роботи як у стартапах, так і у великих продуктових та аутсорс компаніях. Мені подобається брати на себе відповідальність за технічні рішення та тісно співпрацювати з дизайнерами, менеджерами проєктів і іншими інженерами для створення якісних продуктів.

workHistory.description: Developed and maintained the UI for a platform for monitoring and managing cloud servers and virtual machines. Worked on the project using NextJS/React. Designed and implemented a microfrontend architecture.
keyAchievements: Implemented microfrontends with Module Federation, including a dedicated project for integration and architecture development.
Performed codebase refactoring and standardization, improving readability and maintainability.
Developed and implemented unit and integration tests from scratch, increasing coverage and reducing regressions.
Participated in R&D processes to evaluate new technologies and approaches impacting the product.

workHistory.description: Developed a full-featured web3 application from scratch and delivered it to production within a fixed-time project. Acted as a frontend technical lead, coordinating a team of 3 frontend developers and 1 backend developer. Was responsible for the client-side architecture, blockchain infrastructure integration, and meeting delivery deadlines.
keyAchievements: Designed and implemented the application architecture from the ground up.
Led the frontend team (3 FE + 1 BE), distributed tasks, conducted code reviews, and facilitated technical syncs.
Implemented integration with the web3 stack, including smart contracts and blockchain interactions.

workHistory.description: Worked on the development of a product focused on personal data protection. Developed UI for web, mobile, and desktop applications with a zero-knowledge approach, data access restrictions, and increased client-side security requirements.
keyAchievements: Contributed to the development of a product focused on user data security and privacy protection.
Participated in the development of browser extensions to integrate with the core product.
Independently contributed to the development of a desktop application based on Electron, including adapting web logic for the desktop environment.
Participated in the development of a mobile application using React Native.

workHistory.description: Worked in an outsourcing company on multiple client projects across different domains, including banking, e-commerce, and internal tools. Adapted to various technology stacks and development processes.
keyAchievements: Contributed to the development and maintenance of multiple independent products with different requirements and technology stacks.
Worked with existing codebases, performing refactoring and optimizations to improve stability and performance.
Effectively collaborated with developer teams across different countries.

workHistory.description: Worked in marketing and R&D teams on high-load web interfaces for the product. Collaborated with product teams, contributed to building metrics, running A/B tests, and analyzing user data to improve key performance indicators (KPIs).
keyAchievements: Developed and maintained web interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern frontend tooling.
Implemented a metrics and analytics system to track user activity and evaluate the effectiveness of new features.
Optimized the email campaign preparation process, reducing the time to launch mailings.
Collaborated with R&D and product teams to integrate new features and test hypotheses.

workHistory.description: Worked on large-scale commercial projects and e-commerce websites, including adaptive mobile applications.
keyAchievements: Developed and maintained high-traffic websites and e-commerce platforms with responsive interfaces.
Built and optimized adaptive mobile applications to enhance UX and performance.
Collaborated with product and design teams to implement new features and improve conversion rates.

workHistory.description: Converted design mockups into clean HTML/CSS/JS code. Produced web layouts, promotional materials, and logos.
keyAchievements: Translated design mockups into pixel-perfect, responsive web pages using HTML, CSS, and JS.
Developed web layouts and interactive elements for marketing campaigns.
Created logos and visual assets for branding and promotional materials.

workHistory.description: Built data extraction agents, performed data transformation and cleaning, and loaded results into SQL databases using ETL frameworks.
keyAchievements: Developed ETL pipelines for automated extraction and processing of data from multiple sources.
Performed data cleaning and transformation to improve quality and consistency.
Loaded processed data into SQL databases, optimizing ETL performance and reliability.

education.institution: Petro Mohyla Black Sea State University

achievements.title: Ukrainian Web Challenge IX Finalist
achievements.description: Finalist in the Frontend Developer nomination.

achievements.title: Frontend Mentor
achievements.description: Mentored students in frontend courses. Graduated over 50 students.

achievements.title: Hackathon Contributor
achievements.description: Completed courses on drone management and assembly. Participated in a hackathon focused on developing software for drones.
